Product.Name: Cotton toggle hoodie
Product.Description: Fit for windy days at the beach, this rough-and-ready toggle hoodie is a great piece to have on deck. Because it's made of rugged heavyweight cotton with outdoorsy rope-and-wood toggle closures, it can handle a little rough love. Import. Machine wash.

Product.Name: Toggle shawl-collar sweater
Product.Description: With a kangaroo pocket, a foldover shawl collar and a wooden toggle closure, this popover has style to spare. Its slightly speckled ribbed knit lends texture to any jeans-and-jacket combo. Cotton/poly/rayon in a 3-gauge knit. Import. Machine wash.

Product.Name: Cotton ribbed mockneck cardigan
Product.Description: A sturdy hybrid of two styles the mockneck and the cardigan crafted in heavy-gauge, tough-as-nails cotton. This cold-weather heavyweight ought to last you through quite a few winters. Kangaroo pocket. Import. Machine wash.

Product.Name: Lightweight vintage fleece half zip pullover
Product.Description: A cold-weather essential, our half-zip pullover is crafted in our famous vintage fleece.Cotton. Original fit. Half zip. Rib trim at collar, cuffs and hem. Long sleeves. Import. Machine wash.

Product.Name: Cotton-cashmere shawl-collar sweater
Product.Description: Inherently classic and insanely comfortable, our shawl-collar sweater is made from the finest cotton and cashmere blend. It's distinguished enough to be a stand-alone piece or it can be thrown over a button-down for a cool layered look. In a 12-gauge knit. Button closure. Import. Machine wash.

Product.Name: Marled sweater
Product.Description: The ultimate springtime essential: linen meets cotton in a knit that nips lingering chills in the bud. A slightly rugged marled stitch lends this layer a natty appeal that lasts season after season. In a 5-gauge knit. Crewneck. Import. Machine wash.

Product.Name: Merino V-neck sweater in rugby stripe
Product.Description: A soft and lightweight merino wool sweater that keeps you warm while maintaining a slim profile. It's as comfortable and easy to wear as cotton. In a 12-gauge knit. V-neck. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Ballast sweater
Product.Description: An easy piece you'll want to have in your everyday rotation, this stripe sweater easily transitions from polished to casual without skipping a beat. And best of all, it's made from our supremely soft slub cotton. Crewneck. Import. Machine wash.

Product.Name: Lambswool dotted shawl-collar cardigan
Product.Description: Surprisingly versatile, our dotted cardigan has a distinctive look that lets you dress it up or down. It's constructed from extra-warm, sturdy lambswool and features welt pockets and a shawl collar. This is definitely one of our under-the-radar favorites this season. In a 5-gauge knit. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Heathered cotton sweatshirt sweater
Product.Description: Casual meets refined with classic sweatshirt styling crafted from our heathered slub cotton. Crewneck. Import. Machine wash.

Product.Name: Contrast lambswool shawl-collar sweater
Product.Description: An instant outfit polisher, this easy, throw-on-over-anything lambswool shawl-collar sweater is our secret to looking good on the run. In a 7-gauge knit. Button closure. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Cotton button-collar hoodie
Product.Description: Think of this as a slightly polished version of your favorite hoodie it carries the same familiar comfort but is updated with a button closure and a kangaroo pocket. This is proof that a little change can be a good thing. Cotton. Import. Machine wash.

Product.Name: Alpaca sweater
Product.Description: If you want to get serious about winter this season, our premium wool and alpaca blend sweater just might be the answer. It's timeless, rugged and ready for anything you can throw at it. Our designers even used a unique reverse stitch for a little added texture. Wool/acrylic/alpaca in a 3-gauge knit. Crewneck. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Donegal wool shawl-collar sweater
Product.Description: Crafted in traditional Donegal wool, our shawl-collar sweater is a hardy addition to any winter wardrobe. Wool/polyamide in a 3-gauge knit. Button closure. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Cable shawl-collar sweater
Product.Description: Every man needs a classic jacket alternative that can be worn with almost anything in his closet and this chunky lambswool pullover definitely fits the bill. Its no-fuss look and distinct ability to be dressed up or down make it the perfect fall companion. In a 3-gauge knit. Toggle closure. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Cotton shawl-collar cardigan
Product.Description: Inspired by classic nautical knits, this rugged sweater is our unique take on the cardigan. Its workman-like construction make it the ideal jacket alternative. Try it out with a pair of our easygoing Stanton pants or some dark rinse jeans. Cotton. Import. Machine wash.

Product.Name: J.Crew Shawl-Neck Cotton Sweater
Product.Description: Presidential favourite J.Crew has got the art of relaxed separates down to a T with this shawl-neck cotton sweater, which provides the perfect way to introduce the brand's covetable aesthetic into your style arsenal. Effortlessly understated, keep this versatile layer close to hand throughout the year. Team it with summer shirts or winter knits depending on the season. Shown here with a Woolrich top, Band of Outsiders trousers and Pierre Hardy shoes.

Product.Name: Marled lambswool rollneckTM sweater
Product.Description: Our classic rollneck is fashioned in unexpectedly soft marled lambswool that's weighty enough to withstand the coolest conditions. To achieve the imperfect vintage effect, we used the jaspé knitting technique of twisting two different-colored yarns together to make a marled effect. In a 3-gauge knit. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Cotton-cashmere V-neck sweater in navy yard stripe
Product.Description: We've taken our classic V-neck and added versatile stripes. And it's now crafted in the finest cotton and cashmere blend, so it's soft and refined. In a 12-gauge knit. Import. Machine wash.

Product.Name: Cotton shawl-collar sweater
Product.Description: What do we like about this lightweight sweater? It's classically refined with a shawl collar and a button closure, but it's also a bit sporty and can be worn pretty casually. Cotton. Kangaroo pocket. Import. Machine wash.

Product.Name: Donegal wool cable cardigan
Product.Description: Crafted in traditional Donegal wool, our oatmeal cable cardigan is a hardy addition to any winter wardrobe. Wool/polyamide in a 3-gauge knit. Shawl collar. Welt pockets. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Sunwashed fleece sweatshirt
Product.Description: We took ultrasoft, lightweight french terry fleece, garment-dyed it to give it deep color and then specially treated it to create an authentic, worn-in vintage look. Cotton. Original fit. Crewneck. Rib trim at neck, cuffs and hem. Long sleeves. Import. Machine wash.

Product.Name: Wallace & Barnes Shetland Sutherland sweater
Product.Description: A new collection of old favorites, built using the foundations of traditional workwear, vintage military uniforms and classic outdoor gear as our guide. We set out to replicate the ruggedness of the kind of old-school sweaters our great-grandfathers used to wear. Spun from authentic Scottish yarn, this North Sea-worthy knit features the distinctive heathering and rugged feel that have made Shetland wool a blustery-weather favorite for decades of outdoorsmen. A design team pick, it also boasts tried-and-true details like suede elbow patches and garter stitching at the shoulders, wrists and hips. Wool in a 5-gauge knit. Crewneck. Import.

Product.Name: Cotton sweatshirt sweater
Product.Description: Casual meets refined with classic sweatshirt styling crafted from our comfortable cotton. Crewneck. Import. Machine wash.

Product.Name: Lambswool rollneckTM sweater
Product.Description: Our classic rollneck is fashioned in unexpectedly soft lambswool that's weighty enough to withstand the coolest conditions. In a 3-gauge knit. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Canyon zip sweater
Product.Description: Over a shirt or under a parka, this densely knit wooly layer is long on warmth and just-rugged-enough style. Deep welt pockets come in handy on gloveless days. Wool in a 5-gauge knit. Zip closure. Welt pockets. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Wallace & Barnes Killeady sweater
Product.Description: A new collection of old favorites, built using the foundations of traditional workwear, vintage military uniforms and classic outdoor gear as our guide. Worn for centuries by fishermen and Antarctic explorers alike we set out to replicate the ruggedness of the sweaters these old salts favored while at sea. Crafted completely in Italian yarn, this zip-front sweater features a chunky allover knit and garter-stitch trim that were inspired by vintage British sweaters. Thanks to an ingenious yarn-spinning technique, the sweater has a handcrafted look and slub-like softness, making it much lighter than its rich weave would suggest. Italian wool. Long sleeves. Kangaroo pockets. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Lambswool shawl-collar sweater
Product.Description: Unexpectedly soft lambswool in a sturdy knit. We've combined the shawl collar and pullover styles to create a look that's both smart and easygoing. In a 7-gauge knit. Button closure. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Heathered cotton sweatshirt sweater
Product.Description: Casual meets refined with classic sweatshirt styling crafted from our comfortable cotton yarn. Crewneck. Import. Machine wash.

Product.Name: Donegal wool sweater
Product.Description: We've taken our classic crewneck sweater and updated it in a very distinguished Donegal wool, famous for its warmth and durability. Its unique speckled appearance makes it the perfect alternative to a basic sweater. Wool/polyamide in a 5-gauge knit. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Heathered shawl-collar cardigan
Product.Description: Drawing inspiration from classic nautical knits and functional workwear, this wear-every-day sweater has the ability to consistently add character to any outfit. Its workman-like construction makes it the ideal jacket alternative. Cotton. Import. Machine wash.

Product.Name: Donegal wool shawl-collar henley
Product.Description: Crafted in traditional Donegal wool, our shawl-collar sweater is a hardy addition to any winter wardrobe. Wool/polyamide/acrylic in a 3-gauge knit. Button closure. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Cashmere cable sweater
Product.Description: An absolute classic, our cashmere cable sweater has an unrivaled ability to be dressed up or worn quite casually either way, it's going to make you look good. Made from supersoft, luxurious Italian cashmere in a 7-gauge knit from a world-famous mill. Crewneck. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Plank-stripe cotton hoodie
Product.Description: A tried-and-true classic, this stripe hoodie is crafted in soft and easygoing cotton perfect for fall and beyond. Import. Machine wash.

Product.Name: Marled lambswool shawl-collar cardigan
Product.Description: There are few other sweaters that will keep you as warm and cozy as our incredibly hardy lambswool cardigan. It's easy to wear and features a convenient kangaroo pocket and a slight shawl collar. This is definitely something you'll have for years. In a 5-gauge knit. Button closure. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Cotton-cashmere sweater in Interlaken stripe
Product.Description: Our classic stripe crewneck is crafted in the finest cotton and cashmere blend. It's soft, refined and, quite honestly, a great basic to have on hand. In a 12-gauge knit. Import. Machine wash.

Product.Name: Merino sweater in microstripe
Product.Description: A soft and lightweight merino wool sweater that keeps you warm while maintaining a slim profile. It's as comfortable and easy to wear as cotton. In a 12-gauge knit. Crewneck. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Wallace & Barnes Wellfleet sweater
Product.Description: A new collection of old favorites, built using the foundations of traditional workwear, vintage military uniforms and classic outdoor gear as our guide. Worn for centuries by fishermen and Antarctic explorers alike, we set out to replicate the ruggedness of the sweaters these old salts favored while at sea. Starting with 100 percent wool yarn from Italy, these hearty crewnecks are completely hand knit, with a seamless, knit-in construction at the cuffs and neck. Sturdy and incredibly warm, with bulk kept to a minimum due to the distinct way the yarn is spun. A rustic, maritime-influenced layer for the cold weather ahead. In a 3-gauge knit. Crewneck. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Lambswool shawl-collar cardigan
Product.Description: The perfect alternative to a jacket, this heavy-gauge sweater is our rugged take on the cardigan. Details like handy patch pockets make it the ideal layering piece. Lambswool in a 7-gauge knit. Shawl collar. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Marled lambswool shawl-collar sweater
Product.Description: This classic gentleman's sweater updated in our signature marled yarn is a skillful shape-shifter: Dress it up with a blazer or dress it down layered over a tee. Lambswool in a 7-gauge knit. Button front. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Lambswool shawl-collar henley
Product.Description: Up-to-the-moment refinement with a laid-back feel in hardy lambswool. Details like contrast rib trim at the hem, cuffs and welt chest pockets add modern appeal to this classic style. In a 7-gauge knit. Shawl collar. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Lambswool shawl-collar cardigan
Product.Description: Our warm and chunky knit lambswool is the perfect excuse to trade up your jacket for a cool cardigan this season. In a 3-gauge knit. Shawl collar. Welt pockets. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Sueded half-zip pullover
Product.Description: Crafted in soft sueded cotton, it's the ultimate year-round layering piece that every guy should have in rotation. Cotton. Original fit. Rib trim at neck and cuffs. Long sleeves. Side vents with tennis tail. Import. Machine wash.

Product.Name: J.Crew Cashmere V-Neck Sweater
Product.Description: Brighten up your knitwear contingent with this apple-green soft cashmere sweater from J.Crew. The vibrant tone and luxurious Italian-made fabric makes it an ideal style solution for a fresh weekend look. Team it with a crisp shirt and classic trousers for a no-brainer off-duty ensemble. Shown here with a J.Crew shirt, Maison Martin Margiela trousers and Rivieras shoes.

Product.Name: Marled lambswool half-zip sweater
Product.Description: To achieve the imperfect vintage effect of this half-zip sweater, we used the jaspé knitting technique of twisting two different-colored yarns together to make a marled effect. Unexpectedly soft lambswool in a rugged 7-gauge knit. Zip closure. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Cotton cable sweater
Product.Description: This is one sweater that you never have to worry about going out of style. It's rugged, classic and forever cool. Cotton. Crewneck. Import. Machine wash.

Product.Name: Marled lambswool sweater
Product.Description: Our classic crewneck, spun from unexpectedly soft lambswool and updated in a handsome marled yarn. In a 7-gauge knit. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Merino crewneck sweater
Product.Description: Such an easy piece that effortlessly dresses up any jacket-and-jeans combo. Made from soft and lightweight merino wool, this slimmed-down sweater is as comfortable and easy to wear as cotton, making it great for layering. In a 12-gauge knit. Crewneck. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Slim cashmere V-neck sweater
Product.Description: Supersoft and luxurious Italian cashmere in a 12-gauge knit from a world-famous mill. In a new slim fit, tailored closer to the body for a clean-lined silhouette. V-neck. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Lambswool Fair Isle shawl-collar sweater
Product.Description: This classic gentleman's sweater updated in a Fair Isle pattern is the epitome of old-school warmth and will liven up your fall wardrobe. Lambswool in a 7-gauge knit. Shawl collar. Button closure. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Wallace & Barnes Sinclair sweatshirt
Product.Description: A new collection of old favorites we feel no guy should go without, built using the foundations of traditional workwear, vintage military uniforms and classic outdoor gear as our guide. Inspired by athletic wear from the '40s and '50s, when sweats fit as if they were tailored for you, this looks just as at home off the court as it does on. We've recreated the look and feel of vintage Japanese loop-wheeled cotton, coveted for its rarity and unique characteristics, in a hardy heathered fleece exclusive to Wallace & Barnes. We've kept only the authentic details, like inset V gussets at the front and back of the neck, contrast navy 3 1/2" ribbed cuffs and waistband, ribbed side gussets and split-needle flat-locked stitching throughout. Stonewashed for a bit of softness you'll have to do the rest of the work yourself. Original fit. Crewneck. Rib trim at neck, cuffs and hem. Long sleeves. Import. Machine wash.

Product.Name: Marled fleece shawl-collar sweatshirt
Product.Description: A new class of fleece inspired by the texture of Japanese loopwheel fabric an exceptional fleece coveted for its intricate texture, flaws and inconsistencies. We recreated the fabric and gave it our own distinct spin with this exceedingly soft sweatshirt. A bona fide cult classic if we've ever seen one, this piece will be a mainstay in your closet for years. Cotton. Original fit. Shawl collar. Rib trim at cuffs and hem. Long sleeves. Kangaroo pocket. Import. Machine wash.

Product.Name: Deckhand sweater
Product.Description: Lobster-clip closures, utility pockets and woven, dyed-to-match reinforcements are the rugged details that give this hoodie its distinct old-school, old-salt appeal. Cotton. Chest pockets, kangaroo pocket. Import. Machine wash.

Product.Name: Slim cotton-cashmere V-neck sweater
Product.Description: We've updated our classic V-neck made from the finest cotton and cashmere, so it's softer and even more refined. In a new slim fit, tailored closer to the body for a clean-lined silhouette. In a 12-gauge knit. Import. Machine wash.

Product.Name: Merino half-zip sweater
Product.Description: Casual polish for minimalists. This classic pullover is fall's most versatile add-on: Layer it over everything from tees and jeans to a shirt-and-tie combo the soft merino wool knit maintains a slim profile and is as comfortable and easy to wear as cotton. In a 12-gauge knit. Half zip. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Heathered cotton sweatshirt sweater
Product.Description: Casual meets refined with classic sweatshirt styling crafted from our handsome slub cotton yarn. Crewneck. Import. Machine wash.

Product.Name: Merino zip sweater
Product.Description: Casual polish for minimalists. This classic cardigan is fall's most versatile add-on: Layer it over everything from tees and jeans to a shirt-and-tie combo the soft merino wool knit maintains a slim profile and is as comfortable and easy to wear as cotton. In a 12-gauge knit. Zip front. Welt pockets. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Boiled lambswool cardigan
Product.Description: Boiled lambswool is a shrunken-down fabric that's known for being incredibly sturdy and warm so this shawl-collar cardigan might just turn into a favorite. Chest pocket and patch pockets. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Merino cardigan
Product.Description: Such an easy piece that effortlessly dresses up any jeans-and-jacket combo. Made from soft and lightweight merino wool, this slimmed-down cardigan is as comfortable and easy to wear as cotton, making it great to layer over anything. In a 12-gauge knit. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Merino vest
Product.Description: Such an easy piece that effortlessly dresses up any jeans-and-jacket combo. Made from soft and lightweight merino wool, this slimmed-down vest is as comfortable and easy to wear as cotton, making it great for layering over anything. In a 12-gauge knit. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Cashmere Enfield sweater
Product.Description: A new update to our luxurious Italian cashmere collection casually cool and easygoing in a 7-gauge knit. Crewneck. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Slim merino V-neck sweater
Product.Description: Such an easy piece that effortlessly dresses up any jacket-and-jeans combo. Made from extra-fine merino wool, this slimmed-down sweater is as comfortable and easy to wear as cotton, making it great for layering. In a 12-gauge knit. V-neck. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Merino polo sweater
Product.Description: Such an easy piece that effortlessly dresses up any jeans-and-jacket combo. Made from soft and lightweight merino wool, this slimmed-down sweater is as comfortable and easy to wear as cotton, making it great for layering. In a 12-gauge knit. Chest pocket. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Merino V-neck sweater
Product.Description: Such an easy piece that effortlessly dresses up any jacket-and-jeans combo. Made from soft and lightweight merino wool, this slimmed-down sweater is as comfortable and easy to wear as cotton, making it great for layering. In a 12-gauge knit. V-neck. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Saturdays pullover hooded sweatshirt
Product.Description: This surf shop slash espresso bar's eponymous line of laid-back beach gear brings California surf culture to the heart of NYC, encouraging even hard-core city boys to channel their inner Johnny Utah or just hang ten. Wool/cotton. Hooded. Long sleeves. Kangaroo pocket. Import. Machine wash.

Product.Name: Saturdays fleece full-zip hooded sweatshirt
Product.Description: This surf shop slash espresso bar's eponymous line of laid-back beach gear brings California surf culture to the heart of NYC, encouraging even hard-core city boys to channel their inner Johnny Utah or just hang ten. Cotton/wool. Hooded. Long sleeves. Kangaroo pocket. Import. Machine wash.

Product.Name: Marled cotton hooded henley
Product.Description: A very cool third layer to wear between a shirt and a jacket, this versatile hoodie is just as handsome over a basic tee. Our marled yarn lends a distinguished look and the switched-up tones on the cuffs and hem add an offbeat vibe. Cotton. Kangaroo pocket. Import. Machine wash.

Product.Name: North Sea Clothing expedition sweater
Product.Description: Founded by a former collector of vintage military and motorcycle wear, North Sea Clothing offers a line of heritage knits inspired by wartime-issue submariner jumpers. Crafted from 100 percent British wool, this piece is based on a 1930s motorcyclist's jumper, with a few updates to accommodate modern builds and materials, including an extended rib, British-made brass shank buttons and a narrower shoulder. This is definitely the real deal. British wool in a 6-gauge knit. Shawl collar. Popover with single-button closure. Made in England. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Cotton-cashmere zip hoodie
Product.Description: A casual classic in a soft blend of cotton and cashmere. Styled like a sweatshirt, with a kangaroo pocket and top-stitched seams. In a 9-gauge knit. Zip front. Import. Machine wash.

Product.Name: Cotton-cashmere sweater
Product.Description: We've updated our classic crewneck made from the finest cotton and cashmere, so it's softer and even more refined. In a 12-gauge knit. Import. Machine wash.

Product.Name: Saint James® Binic II sweater
Product.Description: Saint James has been spinning some of the world's finest knits out of their Normandy, France-based factory since 1850, but they're most famous for their clean and classic nautical stripes. At once lightweight and warm, in salt- and sea-ready 100 percent wool, this classic sailor's sweater exudes that rugged charm that Saint James has perfected. With branded buttons on one shoulder. Crewneck. Made in France. Hand wash.

Product.Name: Fine lambswool Aberdeen Fair Isle sweater
Product.Description: The real standard-bearer of men's sweaters, reimagined with a modern pop of color. Great for layering and pairing with tweeds, jeans or chinos. Unexpectedly soft lambswool in a 7-gauge knit. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Wool-cashmere sweater
Product.Description: Our soft, lightweight crewneck is made in a fine blend of cashmere and Italian wool making it the perfect stand-alone piece or great layered under a jacket. With its clean look and laid-back feel, it's the perfect all-occasion sweater. Italian wool/viscose/nylon/angora/cashmere in a 12-gauge knit. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Cashmere zip hoodie
Product.Description: Nothing compares to our soft, luxurious Italian cashmere in a 7-gauge knit from a world-famous mill. Zip front. Kangaroo pocket. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Cashmere tipped cardigan
Product.Description: A cardigan for all seasons, crafted from our finest Italian cashmere in a 12-gauge knit. Contrast sleeves as well as trim around the placket and hem give this classic style a sporty twist. Lightweight and perfect for layering. Welt pockets. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Mason shawl-collar henley
Product.Description: Up-to-the-moment refinement with a laid-back feel in extra-fine wool. Details like contrasting rib trim at the hem and cuffs, as well as the cargo chest pocket, add modern appeal to this classic style. In a 7-gauge knit. Button closure. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Wool-cashmere turtleneck sweater
Product.Description: A classic style crafted in premium Italian yarn and cashmere. Italian lambswool/viscose/polyamide/angora/cashmere in a 12-gauge knit. Turtleneck. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Marled fleece sweatshirt
Product.Description: Inspired by the texture of sought-after vintage Japanese loopwheel fabric, we created this special, exceedingly soft fabric and used it to create this classic piece. Guaranteed to be a mainstay in your closet for years. Original fit. Cotton. Crewneck. Rib trim at neck, cuffs and hem. Long sleeves. Import. Machine wash.

Product.Name: Cotton-cashmere cardigan
Product.Description: This classic cardigan in our finest cotton and cashmere adds easy sophistication to any look. In a 12-gauge knit. Import. Machine wash.

Product.Name: Cotton-cashmere V-neck sweater
Product.Description: We've updated our classic V-neck made from the finest cotton and cashmere, so it's softer and even more refined. In a 12-gauge knit. Import. Machine wash.

Product.Name: Cotton-cashmere zip mockneck sweater
Product.Description: A casual classic, in a supersoft blend of cotton and cashmere. Styled like a sweatshirt, with a kangaroo pocket and top-stitched seams. In a 12-gauge knit. Zip front. Import. Machine wash.

Product.Name: Wool-cashmere V-neck sweater
Product.Description: As far as we're concerned, you can't have too many of these sweaters. The style is classic in a fine blend of cashmere and Italian wool. Italian wool/viscose/nylon/angora/cashmere in a 12-gauge knit. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Alpaca shawl-collar cardigan
Product.Description: One for the ages a casually refined classic in a premium wool and alpaca blend, our much-loved shawl-collar cardigan is the wear-everywhere layer every guy needs. Extra warm, with a handknit placket and slash pockets. Wool/acrylic/alpaca in a 3-gauge knit. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Wool-cashmere cable half-zip sweater
Product.Description: Our classic cables are softer than ever, thanks to a lofty new cashmere blend made from exquisite Italian yarn. Italian wool/viscose/nylon/angora/cashmere in a 5-gauge knit. Mockneck. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: J.Crew Cashmere Crew Neck Sweater
Product.Description: Navy cashmere J.Crew sweater with a ribbed crew neck collar, cuffs and hem. Made with fine Italian cashmere, this sweater makes a statement either on its own or styled under a blazer. Shown here with a Calvin Klein T-shirt, Burberry Prorsum trousers and Church's shoes.

Product.Name: Wool-cashmere mockneck sweater
Product.Description: This sweater tops our list of favorites, thanks to a new supersoft, luxurious blend of Italian wool and cashmere. And you can't go wrong with the silhouette it simply looks great with everything. Italian wool/viscose/nylon/angora/cashmere in a 5-gauge knit. Mockneck. Button closure from midchest. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Wool-cashmere cable cardigan
Product.Description: Our classic cables are softer than ever, thanks to a sumptuous new Italian wool and cashmere blend. Italian wool/viscose/nylon/angora/cashmere in a 3-gauge knit. Shawl collar. Single-button closure at neck. Welt pockets. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Cashmere V-neck sweater in jetty stripe
Product.Description: Supersoft and luxurious Italian cashmere in a 12-gauge knit from a world-famous mill. V-neck. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: J.Crew Cashmere Zip Up Hoodie
Product.Description: J.Crew zip up hoodie with front pockets, ribbed cuffs and hem, and drawstring toggles. In super fine navy blue cashmere, this hoodie is an ideal piece for laid back weekend style. Team with chinos for low-key, luxurious style. Shown here with a James Perse T-shirt, J.Crew trousers and Lanvin sneakers.

Product.Name: Cotton-cashmere half-zip sweater
Product.Description: We've updated this much-loved pullover to make it our best yet our designers used a special knitting technique, so it's softer and more refined than ever. Cotton/cashmere in a 7-gauge knit. Mockneck. Zipper with leather pull-tab. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: J.Crew Classic Cashmere Cardigan
Product.Description: Navy cashmere cardigan from J.Crew with two front pockets and ribbed collar and cuffs. Neat, simple and tactile, this cardigan comes in ultra-soft Italian cashmere for everyday luxury. Over a shirt it's suitable for work; alternatively, wear with favourite jeans for a contrast of texture. Shown here with a Gucci shirt, Marc by Marc Jacobs trousers and Church's brogues.

Product.Name: Cashmere half-zip sweater
Product.Description: We guarantee you'll wear this supersoft, superwarm Italian cashmere sweater day after day and year after year. This luxurious 7-gauge knit comes from a world-famous mill. Half zip. Rib trim at neck, cuffs and hem. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Cashmere turtleneck sweater
Product.Description: Our latest addition in supersoft, superfine Italian cashmere in a 12-gauge knit it's a total luxury. Turtleneck. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: J.Crew Cashmere Crew Neck Sweatshirt
Product.Description: Light grey knitted J.Crew Italian cashmere sweater with a crew neck and ribbed collar, cuffs and hem. A luxurious take on a classic sportswear design, layer this effortlessly easy sweater over a white shirt or T-shirt to refine your casual weekend style. Shown here with a Calvin Klein T-shirt, Viktor & Rolf trousers and Converse sneakers.

Product.Name: Cashmere sweatshirt
Product.Description: Made to look more casual with classic sweatshirt styling, yet still incredibly luxurious in supersoft Italian cashmere in a 12-gauge knit from a world-famous mill. Crewneck. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Fine lambswool button-down vest
Product.Description: Unexpectedly soft lambswool in a 7-gauge knit. Real South American Corozo nut buttons. Welt pockets. Import. Hand wash.

Product.Name: Lambswool half-zip sweater
Product.Description: Unexpectedly soft lambswool in a 7-gauge knit. Mockneck. Half zip with leather pull-tab. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Lambswool sweater
Product.Description: Unexpectedly soft lambswool in a 7-gauge knit. Crewneck. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Lambswool V-neck sweater
Product.Description: Unexpectedly soft lambswool in a 7-gauge knit. V-neck. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Cashmere cardigan
Product.Description: A key piece no matter what the season. Made from supersoft, luxurious Italian cashmere in a 12-gauge knit from a world-famous mill. Finished with genuine shell buttons. Welt pockets. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Cashmere V-neck sweater
